title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Partner Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Special Events     Centennial     Partner Information                  Centennial Partners       Lassen Volcanic National Park invites is numerous partners to join in the 2016 park and National Park Service centennial celebration. Local businesses, organizations, and individuals provide services to support nearly half a million visitors to Lassen Volcanic each year. These groups also provide support  through fundraising and volunteer support. The resources below are provided to help you plan for special centennial events whether it be promoting related services or simply promoting your national park. Please contact the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center at (530) 595-4480 or lavo_information@nps.gov for additional information.  Centennial Event Posters We recommend rotating these posters as events approach.
